title: Is Whatsapp web down?
text: QUOTE(Xploit Machine @ Sep 8 2025, 04:27 PM) Whatsapp Web can make payments? QUOTE(PJng @ Sep 8 2025, 04:27 PM) QUOTE(smallcrab @ Sep 8 2025, 04:32 PM) Payment need to be processed by company, so need invoice. cb shop can only give invoice thru Whatsapp. They couldn't use WhatsApp web so I cannot get invoice from them. All settled, told the clerk to use Gmail instead
